Ways You Can Help!

Collect Information

You did the right thing by coming to this website. Getting information regarding climate change is the first step in helping to prevent it.

Don't Waste Energy At Home

Helping prevent climate change starts at home. Make sure to turn off the lights you do not need and unplug the appliances you are not using.

Don't Use the Car as Much

If it was up to the environment, people would not be driving cars. Use more environmentally friendly methods of transportation such as a bike or a bus.

Avoid Packaging that is Not Recycle Friendy

When shopping keep in mind that certain items are packaged in materials that are not recyclable, do your best to avoid these items.

Solar Heat

Try Using solar heat by installing solar panels where it is possible.

Donate

Donate your money or time by volunteering to organizations such as ours.
